item.title: 与 Coinbase 链接的区块链正在探索一种新的加密货币
item.description: Coinbase Global 公司创办的公共区块链 Base 正在探索一种新的加密货币，此举有助于为其支持的项目筹集资金。【原文：Base, a public blockchain Coinbase Global Inc. started, is exploring a new cryptocurrency, a move that could help raise money for the projects it underpins.】

item.title: 美国农业部报告看跌后，玉米从三个月高点回落
item.description: 玉米期货从三个月高点回落，抹去了上周五的大部分涨幅，因为交易商正在消化美国农业部发布的一份看跌报告，该报告预测玉米作物产量高于预期。【原文：Corn futures eased off a three-month high, erasing most of Friday’s gains as traders digested a bearish report from the US Department of Agriculture that forecast a bigger than expected corn crop.】

item.title: 加州石油合并将受益于油井许可热潮
item.description: 加利福尼亚资源公司（California Resources Corporation）将接管竞争对手贝里公司（Berry Corp），该公司将从州政府的立法中获益，州政府的立法将使钻井变得更加容易。【原文：California Resources Corporation, which is set to take over rival oil driller Berry Corp, stands to benefit from state legislation that would make it easier to drill.】

item.title: 谷歌广告技术出售要约远未达到司法部要求的分手条件
item.description: 谷歌的一位律师周一表示，谷歌曾考虑出售部分广告技术业务，以解决欧洲和美国的反垄断问题。【原文：Google considered selling off parts of its ad tech business to resolve antitrust concerns in Europe and the US, a lawyer for the company said Monday, but a Justice Department proposal to force the sale of its advertising exchange goes much further.】

item.title: 前利率制定者称英格兰银行应停止出售金边债券
item.description: 英国央行前利率制定者警告说，英国央行应停止出售其量化宽松投资组合中的金边债券，因为这种销售正在扭曲货币政策。【原文：The Bank of England should stop selling gilts from its quantitative-easing portfolio because the sales are distorting monetary policy, a former BOE rate-setter warned.】

item.title: 意大利正在起草向银行增资 15 亿欧元的计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）政府正在制定一项初步计划，通过推迟意大利贷款人的税收减免，在2027年从意大利贷款人那里额外筹集15亿欧元（18亿美元）。【原文：Giorgia Meloni’s government is working on a preliminary plan to raise an extra €1.5 billion ($1.8 billion) from Italian lenders in 2027 by postponing their tax deductions, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国车桥公司寻求 23 亿美元资助 Dowlais 收购案
item.description: 美国车桥制造公司（American Axle & Manufacturing Inc.【原文：American Axle & Manufacturing Inc. is looking to raise $2.3 billion in the US leveraged-finance market to help fund its acquisition of Dowlais Group Plc.】

item.title: 智利财政部长尼古拉-格劳誓言在 2026 年预算中限制支出增长
item.description: 智利新任财政部长表示，智利政府将在 2026 年严格控制支出，即使在智利 11 月即将迎来投票之际，财政支出的增幅也将低于往年。【原文：Chile’s government will keep a tight rein on spending in 2026, raising fiscal expenditure by less than in previous years even as the nation heads to the polls in November, the new finance minister said.】

item.title: 降息乐观情绪升温，铜价创 15 个月新高
item.description: 由于交易商为本周美国联邦储备委员会的降息预期做准备，并寻找今年晚些时候进一步宽松政策的线索，铜在更广泛的风险反弹中跳升至15个月高点。【原文：Copper jumped to a 15-month high in a broader risk-on rally, as traders prepared for an expected US Federal Reserve rate cut this week and looked for clues on further easing later in the year.】

item.title: 据悉，Advent 将在旗舰项目筹资中达到 200 亿美元的里程碑
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，自今年年初以来，收购公司 Advent 已为其旗舰基金募集到 200 亿美元资金，一反充满挑战的募资环境。【原文：Buyout firm Advent has raised $20 billion for its flagship fund since the start of the year, defying a challenging fundraising environment, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以色列通胀率自 2024 年 6 月以来首次达到目标
item.description: 以色列的年度通胀率在一年多的时间里首次回升至目标区间，但目前还不清楚决策者是否会认为这足以在本月晚些时候降息。【原文：Israel’s annual inflation inched back into its target range for the first time in over a year, although it’s unclear whether policymakers will consider it enough to cut interest rates later this month.】

item.title: 智利最大铜矿生产国预测，尽管矿山遭遇挫折，产量仍将增长
item.description: 智利占全球铜矿开采量的四分之一，尽管两个主要铜矿遭遇挫折，但智利预计今年的产量将有所增长，这为紧张的全球市场提供了一些喘息的机会。【原文：Chile, which accounts for a quarter of the world’s mined copper, expects output to expand this year despite setbacks at two major mines, offering some respite to a tight global market.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会支持埃克森公司允许散户股东自动投票的计划
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）正在推出一项计划，通过自动系统鼓励更多散户投资者在代理投票中支持公司，该系统有可能限制激进分子的影响力。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. is introducing a program to encourage more retail investors to support the company in proxy votes with an automatic system that threatens to limit the influence of activists.】

item.title: 赞比亚为完成国际货币基金组织（IMF）计划和谈判延期赢得时间
item.description: 国际货币基金组织同意延长赞比亚的现有计划，使其能够完成最终审查并为可能的延期做好准备。【原文：The International Monetary Fund agreed to prolong Zambia’s existing program to allow it to conclude the final review and prepare for a potential extension.】

item.title: 名称中加入 "阿尔法 "的量化基金今年下跌 11.4
item.description: 一家量化对冲基金公司今年 1 月在名称中加入了 "阿尔法"，以反映其赚钱能力，截至 8 月，该公司今年亏损了 11.4%。【原文：A quantitative hedge fund firm that added “Alpha” to its name in January to reflect its money-making prowess lost 11.4% this year through August.】

item.title: 斯塔默否认在支持曼德尔森时知道爱泼斯坦的电子邮件
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）在下议院公开支持时任美国大使的彼得-曼德尔森（Peter Mandelson）之前，曾表示自己并不知晓彼得-曼德尔森与声名狼藉的金融家杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）之间的电子邮件内容。【原文：UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer said he wasn’t aware of the contents of emails from Peter Mandelson to disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein before publicly backing his then-US ambassador in the House of Commons.】

item.title: 德国格拉斯法瑟公司寻求筹资计划失败时的选择方案
item.description: 德国纤维公司 Deutsche Glasfaser Holding GmbH 正在探索各种方案，以防优先股融资计划失败。【原文：German fiber company Deutsche Glasfaser Holding GmbH is exploring options in case its plan to raise preferred equity fails.】

item.title: 贝森特说特朗普威胁关闭 TikTok 已达成协议
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，社交媒体应用 TikTok 在美国的 "黑化 "威胁最终促成了在马德里达成的框架协议，使该平台的美国迭代版本进入美国手中— 切断了与其中国母公司字节跳动（ByteDance）的联系。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the threat of allowing the social media app TikTok to go dark in the US was what ultimately sealed a framework deal in Madrid that would see the American iteration of the platform enter US hands — severing connections with its Chinese parent company ByteDance.】

item.title: 卡茨基尔赌场高收益小额贷款交易再次推迟
item.description: 一项为购买纽约州北部一家赌场相关业务提供资金的高收益市政债券交易再次被推迟。【原文：A high-yield municipal bond transaction to fund the purchase of businesses related to a casino in upstate New York has been delayed again.】

item.title: Erste 首席执行官表示，尽管计划征收银行税，但他在波兰的交易还是不错的
item.description: Erste Group Bank AG 首席执行官彼得-博塞克（Peter Bosek）表示，在这家奥地利贷款机构同意收购当地一家大型贷款机构的股份后，波兰计划征收银行税，但这并不会改变交易的基本吸引力。【原文：Erste Group Bank AG Chief Executive Officer Peter Bosek said a planned banking tax in Poland, unveiled after the Austrian lender agreed to buy a stake in a big local lender, doesn’t change the basic appeal of the deal.】

item.title: 斯塔默战略主管辞职，危机中的总理再遭重创
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）在不到两周的时间内第三次被迫离开政府，他的一位高级顾问因媒体对其过去行为的指控而辞职。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer has suffered a third forced departure from his government in less than two weeks as one of his senior advisers resigned amid media allegations about his past conduct.】

item.title: 美联储降息，加拿大放缓宽松周期，卢布将反弹
item.description: 随着加拿大央行的宽松货币政策周期接近尾声，而美联储正准备进行多次减息，加拿大货币有望从与美国的利率差距缩小中受益。【原文：Canada’s currency is poised to benefit from a smaller interest-rate gap with the US as the nation’s central bank nears the end of its monetary easing cycle while the Federal Reserve gears up for multiple cuts.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀再次缓解，为降息敞开大门
item.description: 尼日利亚 8 月份的年度通货膨胀率连续第五个月下降，这为尼日利亚中央银行可能开始削减创纪录的高借贷成本打开了大门。【原文：Nigeria’s annual inflation decelerated for the fifth straight month in August, opening the door for the central bank to potentially begin pruning record high borrowing costs.】

item.title: 泰森食品公司将在年底前淘汰产品中的玉米糖浆
item.description: 泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods Inc.【原文：Tyson Foods Inc. said it plans to eliminate corn syrup and other ingredients from its products by the end of the year, echoing calls by the Trump administration for changes in the US food supply.】

item.title: Raiffeisen 首席执行官称剥离俄罗斯业务 "不在我们掌握之中
item.description: Raiffeisen Bank International AG 首席执行官约翰-施特罗布尔（Johann Strobl）表示，Raiffeisen Bank International AG 希望离开俄罗斯，但这一决定并不一定由该公司做出。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG wants to leave Russia but that decision isn’t necessarily up to the firm, Chief Executive Officer Johann Strobl said.】

item.title: 美联储利率路径更新前，国债走高
item.description: 在美联储本周召开会议之前，美国国债小幅走强，预计会议将降息四分之一个百分点，并为后续宽松政策的步伐提供线索。【原文：US Treasuries traded modestly stronger before a Federal Reserve meeting this week that’s expected to deliver a quarter-point interest-rate cut and provide clues to the pace of any subsequent easing.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长科切尔称欧元区通胀风险 "相当平衡
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁-科切尔（Martin Kocher）表示，即使目前该地区的通胀风险 "相当平衡"，官员们也随时准备对经济数据的变化做出反应。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martin Kocher said officials stand ready to react to changes in the economic data even if inflation risks for the region are “quite balanced” at the moment.】

item.title: Blackstone 酝酿策略，从对同行的押注中释放现金
item.description: 黑石集团（Blackstone Inc. ）正在考虑转移阵地，从押注其他私人市场公司的战略转入一个新的口袋，以此从那些难以退出的投资中释放利润。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering shifting positions from a strategy that bets on other private-markets firms into a new pocket, as a way to unlock profits from those hard-to-exit investments.】

item.title: Alphabet 市值突破 3 万亿美元
item.description: 本周一，Alphabet 公司加入了估值超过 3 万亿美元的精英公司行列，这是谷歌母公司情绪好转的最新迹象。【原文：Alphabet Inc. joined an elite group of companies valued at more than $3 trillion on Monday in the latest sign of improving sentiment for the Google parent.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行任命花旗集团的 Duffield 为股票挂钩贷款业务主管
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行（Royal Bank of Canada）聘请了长期服务于花旗集团的银行家 Rich Duffield 来领导其股票投资业务。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada has hired long-serving Citigroup Inc. banker Rich Duffield to lead its equity-linked origination efforts.】
